allow:
Bash(codex exec "Frontend Refactoring - CRITICAL PAGES GROUP 1

You are updating TripIt frontend pages from project-focused to travel-focused terminology. Update these 5 critical pages in the frontend/src/pages directory:

1. Feed.tsx:
   - Change ''Discover Projects'' → ''Discover Itineraries''
   - Update descriptions to travel context
   - Import and use itinerariesService instead of projectsService
   - Import ItineraryCard instead of ProjectCard

2. ProjectDetail.tsx:
   - Change ''Project Journey'' → ''Trip Journey''
   - Change ''Tech Stack'' → ''Travel Style & Activities''
   - Change ''Comments'' → ''Travel Intel''
   - Use itinerariesService for API calls
   - Import TravelIntelSection instead of CommentSection

3. MyProjects.tsx:
   - Change title ''My Projects'' → ''My Itineraries''
   - Change button ''New Project'' → ''New Itinerary''
   - Use itinerariesService

4. Publish.tsx:
   - Change form field ''Hackathon Name'' → ''Destination Name''
   - Change ''Tech Stack'' → ''Travel Style & Activities''
   - Add travel-specific fields if needed
   - Use itinerariesService

5. EditProject.tsx (if exists):
   - Update form fields to match Itinerary model
   - Change hackathon fields to destination fields
   - Use itinerariesService

Use the terminology mapping reference from the codebase. Make incremental edits, not wholesale replacements. Maintain code structure." --full-auto --cd "E:\TripIt-dev")

Bash(codex exec "Frontend Refactoring - CORE COMPONENTS GROUP 2

You are updating TripIt frontend components from project-focused to travel-focused terminology. Update these 3 critical components in the frontend/src/components directory:

1. ProjectCard.tsx → Rename to ItineraryCard.tsx:
   - Rename component from ProjectCard to ItineraryCard
   - Update props to use Itinerary type instead of Project
   - Change ''Proof Score'' → ''Credibility Score''
   - Replace vote buttons with safety rating widget
   - Replace comment count with travel intel count
   - Update CSS class names accordingly

2. VoteButtons.tsx → Rename to SafetyRatingWidget.tsx:
   - Rename component and file from VoteButtons to SafetyRatingWidget
   - Change from up/down vote interface to 1-5 star rating widget
   - Update icons (use star icons)
   - Update labels and tooltips
   - Use safetyRatingsService instead of votesService
   - Update prop types

3. CommentSection.tsx → Rename to TravelIntelSection.tsx:
   - Rename component and file from CommentSection to TravelIntelSection
   - Update to display typed travel intel (question, update, warning, recommendation, local_insight)
   - Add intel type selection dropdown/options
   - Update API calls to use travelIntelService
   - Update prop types and interfaces

For each file: read first, then make targeted edits. Maintain code structure and functionality." --full-auto --cd "E:\TripIt-dev")

Bash(codex exec "Frontend Refactoring - OTHER PAGES GROUP 3

You are updating TripIt frontend pages from project-focused to travel-focused terminology. Update these pages in the frontend/src/pages directory:

Pages to update (10 total):
1. Dashboard.tsx - Replace all ''project'' references with ''itinerary''
2. Gallery.tsx - Update filter labels from ''hackathon'' to ''travel destination''
3. Leaderboard.tsx - Update leaderboard labels (projects → itineraries, etc)
4. Search.tsx - Update search result display for itineraries
5. Validator.tsx - Change ''Proof Score'' → ''Credibility Score''
6. InvestorDashboard.tsx - Update project discovery text to travel context
7. InvestorPlans.tsx - Update descriptions and terminology
8. About.tsx - Update about page text to reference travel, not hackathons
9. Navbar.tsx - Change ''My Projects'' → ''My Itineraries'' in navigation
10. Footer.tsx - Update footer text to reference travel instead of projects

For each file: Search for old terminology patterns and replace with new travel-focused language. Maintain functionality. Make incremental edits." --full-auto --cd "E:\TripIt-dev")
